pci_project_new_payment_startup_program_: As part of the OVHcloud Startup Program, you get an individual prepaid account.

This total will be used to pay for your Public Cloud project resource usage. Please note that these credits are only available for specific products. You can find more information on eligible products in this <guideLink label='guide'></guideLink>. Once you have used up your credit, the payment method registered above will be automatically billed to ensure that your instances do not experience any downtime.
